title.narrative: 08-01 PROG COORD PLANNING, M&E

description.narrative: 8.1 UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 8. Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

sector.narrative: PF4C: Budget transparency, accountability and participation

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 8.1 UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes

description.narrative: Guidance, SOPs and tools for the design and management of programmes were developed, and staff andIPswere oriented. The ZCO signed seven rolling workplans, which sustained an exemplary quality rating. The programme monitoring procedure and tool were updated to strengthen end user monitoring and PSEA was implemented, resulting in 112 per cent of programme monitoring visits being conducted. Guidance and tools for the design of the 2023–2027 Country Programme were developed and used to guide consultations on the strategic direction of the new Country Programme. | Status:Met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
